Trade/Device Name(s): Forsure One Step Fecal Occult Blood (FOB) Screen Card Test
Submitter Information: Tianjin New Bay Bioresearch Co., Ltd.
Regulation Name(s): Human Hemoglobin or Fecal Occult Blood (FOB) Test System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Forsure One Step Fecal Occult Blood Screen Card Test for qualitative detection of human hemoglobin in fecal specimens
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection of intact human hemoglobin in fecal specimens to aid in identifying gastrointestinal diseases associated with bleeding such as colorectal carcinoma, Crohn's disease, ulcerative colitis, and colon polyps; for professional and over-the-counter use.
